Congratulations to Hungarian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Hungarian President
    Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, today sent a congratulatory message to Laszlo Solyom on his election as president of Hungary.
 The message sincerely wished the Hungarian president great success in his responsible work for the prosperity and the socio-economic progress of the country.
